about.title: A little about me
about.line1: Hi, I'm a freelance web developer specializing in high-quality complex web solutions for small-medium businesses.
about.line2: I have experience building enterprise-grade web applications at JP Morgan, one of the largest banks in the world and a degree in software development for business (in progress).
about.line3: My aim is to build specialised solutions for the complex needs of modern businesses to help people thrive on the web.
about.line4: Through my services, I can make you a well designed intuitive and professional web presence to allow you to do anything from eCommerce to blogs and everything in between to help grow your business.

1.title: Meeting and discussion
1.desc:
I think the most important part of designing a web application is understanding the business and so this is what I will focus on first, understanding your business’s needs. 
 We will have a discussion about the needs of your business and what you are looking for in a web application then build a specialised plan tailored to your business’ needs. 
Once requirements are decided I can start work immediately.

2.title: Design / Prototype
2.desc: I will draft up an initial design and sketch of what the end product will look like roughly to get feedback.

3.title: Development of high performance web application
3.desc:
My streamlined pipeline for development uses a number of technologies to allow for the best end product. This allows for native application like performance and features without needing to convince users to download anything. 
 Intuitive modern design !Integration into existing systems !Creation of new backend business systems !Application like performance !Business specific SEO results !Admin interface for content management 
 These features will allow you to reach as many customers as possible while improving how you run your business.
 The opportunities of this pipeline I have build are endless. Examples of what can be built include eCommerce, blogs, portfolios, landing pages as well as complex applications needed for the front or back end to support your business.

4.title: Continuous communication and feedback
4.desc:
Throughout this process, I will give continuous updates via your preferred way of communication. 
In addition, you have many opportunities for feedback during development. There can also be 3 major redesigns during the process if you do not like something.

5.title: Final product
5.desc:
The final handoff will include complete ownership over the source code. 
In addition, I will set up hosting with a service that has a very generous free plan as well as options to seamlessly scale along with your business.

6.title: Maintenence options
6.desc:
An additional retainer package is also available for a monthly fee. This would include: 
 Maintenance - framework and security patches !Improvements - Small changes, capped per month, can be A/B tested to measure effectiveness) !Reports - Analytics of the web app’s performance and effectiveness !Immediate support if anything breaks at any point.

1.title: Ross Neilson Web developer
1.desc: Freelance site made in react and gatsby with english and japanese localization
1.detailed: Modern designed landing page !Contact form !Lightweight high performance !Optimized SEO !Mobile friendly !All 90+ score in lighthouse !Progressive Web app (PWA) !Full Japanese and English localization

2.title: Tabi Traveler
2.desc: High-performance photography website with a portfolio, blog and shop
2.detailed: Dynamic landing page design with parallax scrolling effect  !Interactive portfolio for photos with interactive filters !A blog with CMS backend for easy content changes and additions !Shop with stripe for selling prints and automatic processing of orders !SEO optimization !Mobile friendly !High performance !Localization
